name: Grandmother's oracle
description:
Stepping into this virtual kitchen, with the grandmother as an oracle, we will receive her words and advice that have been passed on from generation to generation. With the Mate (traditional South American caffeine-rich infused drink)  as a metronome, a moment of thought to think about what has been passed on us and what we want to pass on.

Suggested requirements:

  • CPU:  Intel Core i5-8400.
  • RAM:8 GB RAM.
  • HDD:  3GB.
  • GPU:Intel(r) HD graphics 620
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, or Windows 10 64-bit.
  • DirectX: Version 12.

Languages: Spanish and english.
